channel.title: Unnamed 317 loading 474
channel.description:
[b][u]Introduction[/u][/b]
Hello all, most of you already know me. I am Loveandpower. It's time for me to start another project and Int Bauk gave me some inspiration that PI can have actual improvements(this isn't to say that these improvements actually make it any better than any other). I am still in early stages so this thread will be updated later on.
[b][u]About Myself[/u][/b]
I have been programming since around July 2010. I feel like I have learned a lot about Java in this time and that I need to test and challenge my skills to push myself even further than I have before in the past. I am still not a java "pro" by any means, but I do know more than the general first time beginner as well.
[b][u]So, what are my plans exactly?[/u][/b]
As the title says this will be a 317 loading 474. I most likely will not hardcode stuff in so that leaves out customs and etc. (even though I do love them haha). I have always been more of a skiller and an economy person. I believe these will be the two main items I shall be working on at first. All combat systems I would like to give 100% credit to Int Bauk as he has done quite a dandy job on it already.
Just like in a professional team though, I am more than open to listen to any feedback and ideas on how the project can further itself and how the project could have new content added. While I have nothing wrong with remakes, this will not be one.
As far as "will this be a hosted projected?" Honestly...I'm not sure. I have ran both successful and non-successful servers. My gut is saying maybe six months down the road it may be an option...but well I just don't know. I quit my last server cause of all the "server drama" people would make. I just hope my good friend John is prepared to help manage stuff if that day comes again!
[b][u]Update Log[/u][/b]
-None as of yet, as I am still waiting on Int Bauk to get back with me on a few issues from his release that I am not 100% sure on. This will be updated at a later time.
[b][u]Bugs[/u][/b]
-After every content piece has been added I shall go and test the content further myself. IF the server ever gets to the point of actually hosting it I will hold a very strict and closed alpha/beta for it.
[b][u]Media[/u][/b]
-I am unable to log in at the moment until Int Bauk gets into contact with me until then here is the image from his download.
[img]http://img593.imageshack.us/img593/7748/fip4.png[/img]
[hr]
[b][u]Ending comments[/u][/b]
Even now I am still kind of unsure as to who I want to be included in this development, and what I am looking for in a programmer/developer. I may consider working with a client developer if he/she can prove themselves actually knowledgeable at what they are doing. I will not accept just anybody.
[b][u]Credits[/u][/b]
-Arham 4 (Layout) -Int Bauk (for his short little project that he did for a couple of hours)

item.description:
@Java-RSPS-Noob wrote:

[quote=“kingman002, post:9, topic:528906”][quote author=Java-RSPS-Noob link=topic=647661.msg4356046#msg4356046 date=1377600938]

You clearly don’t understand what I’m accusing you of lying about.

Just settle down there sonny…
[/quote]I must not :rolleyes:

Anybody on here who has me on Skype knows I’m a pretty honest guy.

What I meant was that you said you would make a development thread in a few days, but you made it the same day.[/quote]Ah that was was typed up before I made the compilers/knew there was going to be errors. I can’t really get started until the errors get fixed.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Java-RSPS-Noob wrote:

[quote=“kingman002, post:2, topic:528906”]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,647385.msg4355883.html#msg4355883
You lie!

gl[/quote]

How do I lie ? ~^

I made a run/compiler batch for that one person. These are errors that I noticed in the compiler itself after I made it. I also posted on the topic that I was waiting for Int Bauk to provide further support as it seemed that certain files were missing.

Please don’t accuse without understanding your own self.
